auth_sentence.content: In turn, such settlements have encouraged more unmeritorious claims, he added.
auth_sentence.res_content: In turn, such settlements have encouraged more unmeritorious claims, he added.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In turn, such settlements have encouraged more unmeritorious claims, he added.

auth_sentence.content: High legal costs had forced defendants to settle unmeritorious claims in turn fuelling more claims.
